title: [空岛插件]无法创建地狱门,咋搞？
author: qq2913467007

replies.author: 帅杀风云110
replies.txt_content:
进如plugins/Essentials中，打开config.yml
把
portal-creation: false复制代码
修改为
portal-creation: true复制代码

replies.author: qq2913467007
